title: By design?
creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Diane O'Connor
brief_description: Provides a behind the scene look at the world of fashion. People from Cherry Lane fashion house, “Dolly” and “Mode” magazines and the Australian Wool corporation talk about what is involved in predicting fashions trends, designing, producing garments and putting together fashion.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Diane O’Connor
